Posts.Content: Jan 1, 2010 09:49PM nervous1 wrote: YEAH ELLY!!!  I'm so happy to hear your good news!  I'm waiting as patiently as possible for my own.  Thanks so much to all you ladies that have kept us both in your thoughts and prayers.  It makes a world of difference.  Hoping to join you in the B9 group elly. Blessings for your new year all!
Posts.Title: Core biopsy, waiting and apprehensive elly chrismcg

Posts.Content: Dec 31, 2009 09:21AM nervous1 wrote: Hi Elly, I just had my biopsy done yesterday too.  They worked me over pretty good, but I get to take the ace bandage off today.  :-)  I'm glad you are getting your results so quickly.  I have to wait until Monday or Tuesday.  :-(  Praying for B9 results for both of us!

Posts.Content: Jan 3, 2010 05:18PM nervous1 wrote: Cindy, these poems are so beautiful and moving...I just sit here and cry.  I agree with the other person that suggested you publish them when you are on the other side of this war.  I know they would truly bless others as they have us on this list. Blessings to you!
